source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT pac_reg AS CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    , rtrim(ltrim(pac_nome)) AS NM_PESSOA_FISICA
    , convert(CHAR(10), osm_dthr, 121) AS DT_ENTRADA
    , LEFT(CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), osm_dthr, 114),8) AS HR_ENTRADA
    , smm_med AS NM_MEDICO
    , osm_cnv AS CD_CONVENIO
    , cnv_nome AS DS_CONVENIO
    , convert(VARCHAR, (convert(VARCHAR, osm_serie) + convert(VARCHAR, osm_num))) AS NR_ATENDIMENTO
    , emp_cgc AS CNPJ
    , emp_nome_fantasia AS DS_UNIDADE
    , emp_nome_fantasia AS MARCA
    , 0 AS CD_PROCEDENCIA
    , 'NAO ENCONTRADO' AS DS_PROCEDENCIA
    , 'NAO ENCONTRADO' AS ID
    , CONVERT(INT, DAY(osm_dthr)) AS DIA
    , CONVERT(INT, MONTH(osm_dthr)) AS MES
    , CONVERT(INT, YEAR(osm_dthr)) AS ANO
FROM osm
INNER JOIN smm
    ON smm_osm_serie = osm_serie
        AND smm_osm = osm_num
INNER JOIN pac
    ON pac_reg = osm_pac
INNER JOIN cnv
    ON osm_cnv = cnv_cod
INNER JOIN str
    ON str_cod = osm_str
INNER JOIN psv
    ON psv_cod = osm_mreq
LEFT OUTER JOIN str str_e
    ON str.str_str_cod = str_e.str_cod
LEFT OUTER JOIN emp
    ON str_e.str_emp_cod = emp_cod
WHERE 1 = 1
    AND (
        smm_pacote IS NULL
        OR (smm_pacote = 'C')
        )
    AND smm_sfat NOT IN ('C')

AND osm_dthr BETWEEN GETDATE() - 730 AND GETDATE()

SELECT DISTINCT AGM_PAC AS CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    , agm.agm_cnv_cod AS CD_CONVENIO
    , emp_cgc AS CNPJ
    , CONVERT(DATE, AGM_HINI) AS DATA_AGENDA
    , LEFT(CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), agm_hini, 114), 8) AS HORA_AGENDA
    , CASE AGM_ATEND
        WHEN 'CRG'
            THEN 'Cirurgia'
        WHEN 'ASS'
            THEN 'Consulta'
        when '' then 'Consulta'
        ELSE 'Outros'
        END AS TIPO_AGENDA
    , pac.PAC_NOME AS NM_PACIENTE
    , smk.smk_nome AS DS_PROCEDIMENTO_PRINC
    , ' ' DS_PROCEDIMENTO_ADIC
    , 1 AS IE_QUANTIDADE
    , USR_NOME AS NM_USUARIO
    , psv_nome AS NM_MEDICO
    , EMP_NOME_FANTASIA AS DS_UNIDADE
    , EMP_NOME_FANTASIA AS MARCA
    , CASE 
        WHEN AGM_STAT = 'A'
            THEN 'Aberta'
        WHEN AGM_STAT = 'E'
            THEN 'Executada'
        WHEN AGM_STAT = 'C'
            THEN 'Cancelada'
        WHEN AGM_STAT = 'B'
            THEN 'Bloqueada'
        END STATUS_AGENDA
    , CONVERT(VARCHAR, convert(VARCHAR, AGM_OSM_SERIE) + convert(VARCHAR, AGM_OSM_NUM)) AS NR_ATENDIMENTO
    , AGM_num AS NR_SEQUENCIA
    , '' ID
    , '' AS CD_PROCEDENCIA
    , agm_proc AS DS_PROCEDENCIA
    , agm.AGM_DTMRC AS DT_AGENDAMENTO
    , CONVERT(INT, DAY(AGM_HINI)) AS DIA
    , CONVERT(INT, MONTH(AGM_HINI)) AS MES
    , CONVERT(INT, YEAR(AGM_HINI)) AS ANO
    , ' ' DS_CLASSIFICACAO
    , ' ' DS_AGRUPAMENTO
    , agm.AGM_CANC_MOT_COD AS CD_MOTIVO_CANCELAMENTO
    , agm.AGM_CANC_MOT_TIPO AS DS_MOTIVO_CANCELAMENTO
    , agm_med AS CD_AGENDA
FROM agm
INNER JOIN usr
    ON (agm.agm_usr_login = usr.usr_login)
INNER JOIN psv
    ON (psv.psv_cod = agm.agm_med)
INNER JOIN smk
    ON (
            agm_smk = smk_cod
            AND agm_tpsmk = smk_tipo
            )
INNER JOIN pac
    ON (pac_reg = agm_pac)
INNER JOIN loc
    ON (AGM_LOC = LOC_COD)
INNER JOIN str
    ON (LOC_STR = STR.STR_COD)
INNER JOIN str str_e
    ON (STR.STR_STR_COD = STR_E.STR_COD)
INNER JOIN cnv
    ON (CNV_COD = AGM_CNV_COD)
LEFT OUTER JOIN ctf ct1
    ON (
            ct1.ctf_cod = smk_ctf
            AND ct1.ctf_tipo = smk_tipo
            )
LEFT OUTER JOIN emp
    ON emp_cod = str_e.str_emp_cod

WHERE AGM_DTMRC BETWEEN GETDATE() - 730 AND GETDATE()

select
usr_login as NM_USUARIO,
usr_nome as DS_USUARIO,
usr_status as IE_SITUACAO,
usr_dt_alter_senha as DT_ATUALIZACAO,
'DAYHORC -  UNIDADE ITAIGARA' AS DS_UNIDADE,
'13188370000227' as CNPJ,
'DH' as MARCA
from usr

SELECT
RCL_SMM AS NR_SEQUENCIA,
CONVERT(DATE,RCL_DTHR_ATUAL) AS DT_ATUALIZACAO,
CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_DTHR_ATUAL,108) as HR_ATUALIZACAO,

CONVERT(VARCHAR,CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_OSM_SERIE) + CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_OSM)) AS NR_ATENDIMENTO, 

RCL_MED AS CD_MEDICO,
PSV_APEL AS NM_MEDICO,
'' AS DS_RETORNO,
CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_LAUDO_RTF) AS DS_CONDUTA,
RCL_PAC AS CD_PESSOA_FISICA,
CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_TXT) AS DS_DIAGNOSTICO,
'DAYHORC -  UNIDADE ITAIGARA' AS DS_UNIDADE,
'13188370000227' as CNPJ,
'DH' AS MARCA
FROM RCL
INNER JOIN PSV ON PSV_COD = RCL_MED

WHERE RCL_DTHR_ATUAL BETWEEN GETDATE() - 730 AND GETDATE()

SELECT distinct agd_med AS CD_AGENDA 
    , 0 AS DS_AGENDA
    , 0 CD_TIPO_AGENDA
    , psv_cod AS CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    , emp_cgc AS CNPJ
    , '' AS DS_AREA_ATUACAO
    , 'A' AS IE_SITUACAO
    -- , CASE 
    --     WHEN (agd_dt_reconstr IS not NULL and AGD_DT_GERA is not null)
    --         THEN agd_dt_reconstr
    --     WHEN (agd_dt_reconstr IS NULL and AGD_DT_GERA is not null)
    --         THEN agd_dt_gera
    --     ELSE AGD_DT_GERA
    --     END AS DT_ATUALIZACAO
FROM agd
INNER JOIN PSV
    ON agd_med = psv_cod
INNER JOIN loc
    ON loc_cod = agd_loc
INNER JOIN str
    ON str_cod = loc_str
LEFT OUTER JOIN str str_e
    ON str_e.str_cod = str.str_str_cod
LEFT OUTER JOIN emp
    ON emp_cod = str_e.str_emp_cod

source.oracleReaderQuery:
select pf.cd_pessoa_fisica, pf.nm_pessoa_fisica, 

to_char(at.dt_entrada,'dd/mm/yyyy') as dt_entrada,
to_char(at.dt_entrada,'hh24:mi:ss') as hr_entrada, 

obter_nome_pf(at.cd_medico_resp) as nm_medico, c.cd_convenio, obter_nome_convenio(c.cd_convenio) AS ds_convenio, 
at.nr_atendimento,
e.cd_cgc as CNPJ,
nm_fantasia_estab DS_UNIDADE,
em.nm_razao_social MARCA,

at.cd_procedencia,
p.ds_procedencia,
'NAO ENCONTRADO' as ID,

to_char(at.dt_entrada,'dd') dia,
to_char(at.dt_entrada,'mm') mes,
to_char(at.dt_entrada,'yyyy') ano,
at.dt_cancelamento,
at.dt_atualizacao

from 
atendimento_paciente at, 
pessoa_fisica pf,
atend_categoria_convenio c,
procedencia p,
estabelecimento e,
empresa em
where at.cd_pessoa_fisica = pf.cd_pessoa_fisica
and at.cd_procedencia = p.cd_procedencia (+)
and at.nr_atendimento = c.nr_atendimento
and at.cd_estabelecimento = e.cd_estabelecimento
and e.cd_empresa = em.cd_empresa

AND at.dt_entrada between SYSDATE - 730 AND SYSDATE

-- Consulta HOB - Azure

select o.nr_sequencia as nr_sequencia, 
to_char(o.dt_atualizacao,'dd/mm/yyyy') as dt_atualizacao,
to_char(o.dt_atualizacao,'hh24:mi:ss') as hr_atualizacao, 
o.nr_atendimento, 
o.cd_medico as cd_medico ,
obter_nome_pf(o.cd_medico) as nm_medico, 
c.qt_periodo||' '||c.ie_periodo as ds_retorno,  
substr(z.conduta,1,1000) as ds_conduta,
obter_pessoa_atendimento(o.nr_atendimento, 'C') as cd_pessoa_fisica,

(select unique d.cd_doenca ||' - '|| a.ds_doenca_cid
from diagnostico_doenca d, 
     cid_doenca a
where a.cd_doenca_cid = d.cd_doenca
and d.nr_atendimento = o.nr_atendimento
and d.nr_seq_interno = (select max(x.nr_seq_interno) from diagnostico_doenca x where x.nr_atendimento = d.nr_atendimento)) as ds_diagnostico,

obter_nome_estab(obter_estab_atendimento(o.nr_atendimento)) as DS_UNIDADE,

e.cd_cgc as cnpj,

'HOB' as MARCA

from oft_consulta o,
     (SELECT a.nr_seq_consulta, b.ds_resultado as conduta
      FROM   med_avaliacao_paciente a 
      inner join med_avaliacao_result b ON b.nr_seq_avaliacao = a.nr_sequencia 
      WHERE  a.nr_seq_tipo_avaliacao = 34 
      and  b.nr_seq_item = 457 --456, 458 ) 
      GROUP  BY a.nr_seq_consulta, b.ds_resultado) z,
      oft_conduta c,
      estabelecimento e
where o.nr_sequencia = z.nr_seq_consulta
and o.nr_sequencia = c.nr_seq_consulta
and o.nr_atendimento is not null
and obter_estab_atendimento(o.nr_atendimento) = e.cd_estabelecimento

and o.dt_atualizacao between SYSDATE - 730 AND SYSDATE

-- AGENDAMENTO HOB - Azure

select  a.cd_pessoa_fisica, 
a.cd_convenio, 
obter_cnpj_estabelecimento(ag.cd_estabelecimento) as cnpj,
to_char((a.hr_inicio) , 'dd/mm/yyyy') as data_agenda,
to_char((a.hr_inicio) , 'hh24:mi:ss') as hora_agenda,
'Consulta' as tipo_agenda,
pf.nm_pessoa_fisica as nm_paciente,
substr(obter_desc_procedimento(a.cd_procedimento, a.ie_origem_proced),1,1000) as ds_procedimento_princ,
substr((select Listagg(Obter_desc_procedimento(p.cd_procedimento, p.ie_origem_proced), ' ;') within GROUP (ORDER BY Obter_desc_procedimento(p.cd_procedimento, p.ie_origem_proced))  from AGENDA_PACIENTE_PROC p where p.nr_sequencia = a.nr_sequencia),1,1000) as ds_procedimento_adic,
1 + (select count(1)from AGENDA_PACIENTE_PROC p where p.nr_sequencia = a.nr_sequencia) as ie_quantidade,
obter_nome_usuario(a.nm_usuario_orig) as nm_usuario,
obter_nome_pf(a.cd_medico_exec) as nm_medico,
e.nm_fantasia_estab DS_UNIDADE,
em.nm_razao_social MARCA,
obter_valor_dominio(83,a.ie_status_agenda) as status_agenda,
a.nr_atendimento,
a.nr_sequencia,
'NAO ENCONTRADO' as ID,
a.cd_procedencia,
p.ds_procedencia,
a.dt_agendamento,

to_char(a.dt_agenda,'dd') dia,
to_char(a.dt_agenda,'mm') mes,
to_char(a.dt_agenda,'yyyy') ano,
ac.ds_classificacao,
aa.ds_agrupamento ds_agrupamento,
a.cd_motivo_cancelamento,
substr(obter_ds_motivo_status(a.nr_sequencia, a.cd_agenda),1,200) as ds_motivo_cancelamento,
a.cd_agenda,
a.dt_atualizacao

from agenda_paciente a,
     agenda ag,
     pessoa_fisica pf,
     procedencia p,
     agenda_paciente_classif ac,
     agrupamento_agenda aa,
     empresa em,
     estabelecimento e
where a.cd_agenda = ag.cd_agenda
and a.cd_pessoa_fisica = pf.cd_pessoa_fisica (+)
and a.cd_procedencia = p.cd_procedencia (+)
and a.nr_seq_classif_agenda = ac.nr_sequencia (+)
and ag.nr_seq_agrupamento = aa.nr_sequencia (+)
and ag.cd_estabelecimento = e.cd_estabelecimento
and e.cd_empresa = em.cd_empresa
and a.cd_pessoa_fisica is not null
and ag.cd_pessoa_fisica is not null
and ag.cd_tipo_agenda = 2

and a.dt_agendamento between SYSDATE - 730 AND SYSDATE

select u.nm_usuario, 
u.ds_usuario, 
u.ie_situacao, 
u.dt_atualizacao,
obter_nome_estabelecimento(u.cd_estabelecimento) as DS_UNIDADE,
e.cd_cgc as CNPJ,
obter_nome_empresa(obter_empresa_estab(u.cd_estabelecimento)) as Marca
from usuario u,
     empresa em,
     estabelecimento e
where u.cd_estabelecimento = e.cd_estabelecimento
and e.cd_empresa = em.cd_empresa

SELECT A.CD_AGENDA, A.DS_AGENDA, A.CD_TIPO_AGENDA, A.CD_PESSOA_FISICA, E.CD_CGC as CNPJ, (SELECT X.DS_AREA_ATUACAO FROM AREA_ATUACAO_MEDICA X
WHERE X.NR_SEQUENCIA = A.NR_SEQ_AREA_ATUACAO) AS DS_AREA_ATUACAO, A.IE_SITUACAO,
A.DT_ATUALIZACAO
FROM AGENDA A,
     ESTABELECIMENTO E
WHERE A.CD_ESTABELECIMENTO = E.CD_ESTABELECIMENTO

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT pac_reg AS CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    , rtrim(ltrim(pac_nome)) AS NM_PESSOA_FISICA
    , convert(CHAR(10), osm_dthr, 121) AS DT_ENTRADA
    , LEFT(CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), osm_dthr, 114),8) AS HR_ENTRADA
    , smm_med AS NM_MEDICO
    , osm_cnv AS CD_CONVENIO
    , cnv_nome AS DS_CONVENIO
    , convert(VARCHAR, (convert(VARCHAR, osm_serie) + convert(VARCHAR, osm_num))) AS NR_ATENDIMENTO
    , emp_cgc AS CNPJ
    , emp_nome_fantasia AS DS_UNIDADE
    , emp_nome_fantasia AS MARCA
    , 0 AS CD_PROCEDENCIA
    , 'NAO ENCONTRADO' AS DS_PROCEDENCIA
    , 'NAO ENCONTRADO' AS ID
    , CONVERT(INT, DAY(osm_dthr)) AS DIA
    , CONVERT(INT, MONTH(osm_dthr)) AS MES
    , CONVERT(INT, YEAR(osm_dthr)) AS ANO
FROM osm
INNER JOIN smm
    ON smm_osm_serie = osm_serie
        AND smm_osm = osm_num
INNER JOIN pac
    ON pac_reg = osm_pac
INNER JOIN cnv
    ON osm_cnv = cnv_cod
INNER JOIN str
    ON str_cod = osm_str
INNER JOIN psv
    ON psv_cod = osm_mreq
LEFT OUTER JOIN str str_e
    ON str.str_str_cod = str_e.str_cod
LEFT OUTER JOIN emp
    ON str_e.str_emp_cod = emp_cod
WHERE 1 = 1
    AND (
        smm_pacote IS NULL
        OR (smm_pacote = 'C')
        )
    AND smm_sfat NOT IN ('C')

AND osm_dthr BETWEEN GETDATE() - 730 AND GETDATE()

SELECT DISTINCT AGM_PAC AS CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    , agm.agm_cnv_cod AS CD_CONVENIO
    , emp_cgc AS CNPJ
    , CONVERT(DATE, AGM_HINI) AS DATA_AGENDA
    , LEFT(CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), agm_hini, 114), 8) AS HORA_AGENDA
    , CASE AGM_ATEND
        WHEN 'CRG'
            THEN 'Cirurgia'
        WHEN 'ASS'
            THEN 'Consulta'
        when '' then 'Consulta'
        ELSE 'Outros'
        END AS TIPO_AGENDA
    , pac.PAC_NOME AS NM_PACIENTE
    , smk.smk_nome AS DS_PROCEDIMENTO_PRINC
    , ' ' DS_PROCEDIMENTO_ADIC
    , 1 AS IE_QUANTIDADE
    , USR_NOME AS NM_USUARIO
    , psv_nome AS NM_MEDICO
    , EMP_NOME_FANTASIA AS DS_UNIDADE
    , EMP_NOME_FANTASIA AS MARCA
    , CASE 
        WHEN AGM_STAT = 'A'
            THEN 'Aberta'
        WHEN AGM_STAT = 'E'
            THEN 'Executada'
        WHEN AGM_STAT = 'C'
            THEN 'Cancelada'
        WHEN AGM_STAT = 'B'
            THEN 'Bloqueada'
        END STATUS_AGENDA
    , CONVERT(VARCHAR, convert(VARCHAR, AGM_OSM_SERIE) + convert(VARCHAR, AGM_OSM_NUM)) AS NR_ATENDIMENTO
    , AGM_num AS NR_SEQUENCIA
    , '' ID
    , '' AS CD_PROCEDENCIA
    , agm_proc AS DS_PROCEDENCIA
    , agm.AGM_DTMRC AS DT_AGENDAMENTO
    , CONVERT(INT, DAY(AGM_HINI)) AS DIA
    , CONVERT(INT, MONTH(AGM_HINI)) AS MES
    , CONVERT(INT, YEAR(AGM_HINI)) AS ANO
    , ' ' DS_CLASSIFICACAO
    , ' ' DS_AGRUPAMENTO
    , agm.AGM_CANC_MOT_COD AS CD_MOTIVO_CANCELAMENTO
    , agm.AGM_CANC_MOT_TIPO AS DS_MOTIVO_CANCELAMENTO
    , agm_med AS CD_AGENDA
FROM agm
INNER JOIN usr
    ON (agm.agm_usr_login = usr.usr_login)
INNER JOIN psv
    ON (psv.psv_cod = agm.agm_med)
INNER JOIN smk
    ON (
            agm_smk = smk_cod
            AND agm_tpsmk = smk_tipo
            )
INNER JOIN pac
    ON (pac_reg = agm_pac)
INNER JOIN loc
    ON (AGM_LOC = LOC_COD)
INNER JOIN str
    ON (LOC_STR = STR.STR_COD)
INNER JOIN str str_e
    ON (STR.STR_STR_COD = STR_E.STR_COD)
INNER JOIN cnv
    ON (CNV_COD = AGM_CNV_COD)
LEFT OUTER JOIN ctf ct1
    ON (
            ct1.ctf_cod = smk_ctf
            AND ct1.ctf_tipo = smk_tipo
            )
LEFT OUTER JOIN emp
    ON emp_cod = str_e.str_emp_cod

WHERE AGM_DTMRC BETWEEN GETDATE() - 730 AND GETDATE()

select
usr_login as NM_USUARIO,
usr_nome as DS_USUARIO,
usr_status as IE_SITUACAO,
usr_dt_alter_senha as DT_ATUALIZACAO,
'HOSPITAL DE OLHOS SANTA LUZIA SS LTDA' AS DS_UNIDADE,
'12305371000160' as CNPJ,
'HOSL' as MARCA
from usr

SELECT
RCL_SMM AS NR_SEQUENCIA,
CONVERT(DATE,RCL_DTHR_ATUAL) AS DT_ATUALIZACAO,
CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_DTHR_ATUAL,108) as HR_ATUALIZACAO,

CONVERT(VARCHAR,CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_OSM_SERIE) + CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_OSM)) AS NR_ATENDIMENTO, 

RCL_MED AS CD_MEDICO,
PSV_APEL AS NM_MEDICO,
'' AS DS_RETORNO,
CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_LAUDO_RTF) AS DS_CONDUTA,
RCL_PAC AS CD_PESSOA_FISICA,
CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_TXT) AS DS_DIAGNOSTICO,
'HOSPITAL DE OLHOS SANTA LUZIA SS LTDA' AS DS_UNIDADE,
'12305371000160' as CNPJ,
'HOSL' AS MARCA
FROM RCL
INNER JOIN PSV ON PSV_COD = RCL_MED

WHERE RCL_DTHR_ATUAL BETWEEN GETDATE() - 730 AND GETDATE()

SELECT distinct agd_med AS CD_AGENDA 
    , 0 AS DS_AGENDA
    , 0 CD_TIPO_AGENDA
    , psv_cod AS CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    , emp_cgc AS CNPJ
    , '' AS DS_AREA_ATUACAO
    , 'A' AS IE_SITUACAO
    -- , CASE 
    --     WHEN (agd_dt_reconstr IS not NULL and AGD_DT_GERA is not null)
    --         THEN agd_dt_reconstr
    --     WHEN (agd_dt_reconstr IS NULL and AGD_DT_GERA is not null)
    --         THEN agd_dt_gera
    --     ELSE AGD_DT_GERA
    --     END AS DT_ATUALIZACAO
FROM agd
INNER JOIN PSV
    ON agd_med = psv_cod
INNER JOIN loc
    ON loc_cod = agd_loc
INNER JOIN str
    ON str_cod = loc_str
LEFT OUTER JOIN str str_e
    ON str_e.str_cod = str.str_str_cod
LEFT OUTER JOIN emp
    ON emp_cod = str_e.str_emp_cod

SELECT DISTINCT pac_reg AS CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    , rtrim(ltrim(pac_nome)) AS NM_PESSOA_FISICA
    , convert(CHAR(10), osm_dthr, 121) AS DT_ENTRADA
    , LEFT(CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), osm_dthr, 114),8) AS HR_ENTRADA
    , smm_med AS NM_MEDICO
    , osm_cnv AS CD_CONVENIO
    , cnv_nome AS DS_CONVENIO
    , convert(VARCHAR, (convert(VARCHAR, osm_serie) + convert(VARCHAR, osm_num))) AS NR_ATENDIMENTO
    , emp_cgc AS CNPJ
    , emp_nome_fantasia AS DS_UNIDADE
    , emp_nome_fantasia AS MARCA
    , 0 AS CD_PROCEDENCIA
    , 'NAO ENCONTRADO' AS DS_PROCEDENCIA
    , 'NAO ENCONTRADO' AS ID
    , CONVERT(INT, DAY(osm_dthr)) AS DIA
    , CONVERT(INT, MONTH(osm_dthr)) AS MES
    , CONVERT(INT, YEAR(osm_dthr)) AS ANO
FROM osm
INNER JOIN smm
    ON smm_osm_serie = osm_serie
        AND smm_osm = osm_num
INNER JOIN pac
    ON pac_reg = osm_pac
INNER JOIN cnv
    ON osm_cnv = cnv_cod
INNER JOIN str
    ON str_cod = osm_str
INNER JOIN psv
    ON psv_cod = osm_mreq
LEFT OUTER JOIN str str_e
    ON str.str_str_cod = str_e.str_cod
LEFT OUTER JOIN emp
    ON str_e.str_emp_cod = emp_cod
WHERE 1 = 1
    AND (
        smm_pacote IS NULL
        OR (smm_pacote = 'C')
        )
    AND smm_sfat NOT IN ('C')

AND osm_dthr BETWEEN GETDATE() - 730 AND GETDATE()

SELECT DISTINCT AGM_PAC AS CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    , agm.agm_cnv_cod AS CD_CONVENIO
    , emp_cgc AS CNPJ
    , CONVERT(DATE, AGM_HINI) AS DATA_AGENDA
    , LEFT(CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), agm_hini, 114), 8) AS HORA_AGENDA
    , CASE AGM_ATEND
        WHEN 'CRG'
            THEN 'Cirurgia'
        WHEN 'ASS'
            THEN 'Consulta'
        when '' then 'Consulta'
        ELSE 'Outros'
        END AS TIPO_AGENDA
    , pac.PAC_NOME AS NM_PACIENTE
    , smk.smk_nome AS DS_PROCEDIMENTO_PRINC
    , ' ' DS_PROCEDIMENTO_ADIC
    , 1 AS IE_QUANTIDADE
    , USR_NOME AS NM_USUARIO
    , psv_nome AS NM_MEDICO
    , EMP_NOME_FANTASIA AS DS_UNIDADE
    , EMP_NOME_FANTASIA AS MARCA
    , CASE 
        WHEN AGM_STAT = 'A'
            THEN 'Aberta'
        WHEN AGM_STAT = 'E'
            THEN 'Executada'
        WHEN AGM_STAT = 'C'
            THEN 'Cancelada'
        WHEN AGM_STAT = 'B'
            THEN 'Bloqueada'
        END STATUS_AGENDA
    , CONVERT(VARCHAR, convert(VARCHAR, AGM_OSM_SERIE) + convert(VARCHAR, AGM_OSM_NUM)) AS NR_ATENDIMENTO
    , AGM_num AS NR_SEQUENCIA
    , '' ID
    , '' AS CD_PROCEDENCIA
    , agm_proc AS DS_PROCEDENCIA
    , agm.AGM_DTMRC AS DT_AGENDAMENTO
    , CONVERT(INT, DAY(AGM_HINI)) AS DIA
    , CONVERT(INT, MONTH(AGM_HINI)) AS MES
    , CONVERT(INT, YEAR(AGM_HINI)) AS ANO
    , ' ' DS_CLASSIFICACAO
    , ' ' DS_AGRUPAMENTO
    , agm.AGM_CANC_MOT_COD AS CD_MOTIVO_CANCELAMENTO
    , agm.AGM_CANC_MOT_TIPO AS DS_MOTIVO_CANCELAMENTO
    , agm_med AS CD_AGENDA
FROM agm
INNER JOIN usr
    ON (agm.agm_usr_login = usr.usr_login)
INNER JOIN psv
    ON (psv.psv_cod = agm.agm_med)
INNER JOIN smk
    ON (
            agm_smk = smk_cod
            AND agm_tpsmk = smk_tipo
            )
INNER JOIN pac
    ON (pac_reg = agm_pac)
INNER JOIN loc
    ON (AGM_LOC = LOC_COD)
INNER JOIN str
    ON (LOC_STR = STR.STR_COD)
INNER JOIN str str_e
    ON (STR.STR_STR_COD = STR_E.STR_COD)
INNER JOIN cnv
    ON (CNV_COD = AGM_CNV_COD)
LEFT OUTER JOIN ctf ct1
    ON (
            ct1.ctf_cod = smk_ctf
            AND ct1.ctf_tipo = smk_tipo
            )
LEFT OUTER JOIN emp
    ON emp_cod = str_e.str_emp_cod

WHERE AGM_DTMRC BETWEEN GETDATE() - 730 AND GETDATE()

select 
usr_login as NM_USUARIO,
usr_nome as DS_USUARIO,
usr_status as IE_SITUACAO,
usr_dt_alter_senha as DT_ATUALIZACAO,
'INOB' AS DS_UNIDADE,
'00363702000130' as CNPJ,
'INOB' as MARCA
from usr

SELECT 
RCL_SMM AS NR_SEQUENCIA,
CONVERT(DATE,RCL_DTHR_ATUAL) AS DT_ATUALIZACAO,
CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_DTHR_ATUAL,108) as HR_ATUALIZACAO,

CONVERT(VARCHAR,CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_OSM_SERIE) + CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_OSM)) AS NR_ATENDIMENTO, 

RCL_MED AS CD_MEDICO,
PSV_APEL AS NM_MEDICO,
'' AS DS_RETORNO,
CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_LAUDO_RTF) AS DS_CONDUTA,
RCL_PAC AS CD_PESSOA_FISICA,
CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_TXT) AS DS_DIAGNOSTICO,
'INOB' AS DS_UNIDADE,
'00363702000130' as CNPJ,
'INOB' AS MARCA
FROM RCL
INNER JOIN PSV ON PSV_COD = RCL_MED

WHERE RCL_DTHR_ATUAL BETWEEN GETDATE() - 730 AND GETDATE()

SELECT distinct agd_med AS CD_AGENDA 
    , 0 AS DS_AGENDA
    , 0 CD_TIPO_AGENDA
    , psv_cod AS CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    , emp_cgc AS CNPJ
    , '' AS DS_AREA_ATUACAO
    , 'A' AS IE_SITUACAO
    -- , CASE 
    --     WHEN (agd_dt_reconstr IS not NULL and AGD_DT_GERA is not null)
    --         THEN agd_dt_reconstr
    --     WHEN (agd_dt_reconstr IS NULL and AGD_DT_GERA is not null)
    --         THEN agd_dt_gera
    --     ELSE AGD_DT_GERA
    --     END AS DT_ATUALIZACAO
FROM agd
INNER JOIN PSV
    ON agd_med = psv_cod
INNER JOIN loc
    ON loc_cod = agd_loc
INNER JOIN str
    ON str_cod = loc_str
LEFT OUTER JOIN str str_e
    ON str_e.str_cod = str.str_str_cod
LEFT OUTER JOIN emp
    ON emp_cod = str_e.str_emp_cod

SELECT DISTINCT  pac_reg AS CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    , rtrim(ltrim(pac_nome)) AS NM_PESSOA_FISICA
    , convert(CHAR(10), osm_dthr, 121) AS DT_ENTRADA
    , LEFT(CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), osm_dthr, 114),8) AS HR_ENTRADA
    , smm_med AS NM_MEDICO
    , osm_cnv AS CD_CONVENIO
    , cnv_nome AS DS_CONVENIO
    , convert(VARCHAR, (convert(VARCHAR, osm_serie) + convert(VARCHAR, osm_num))) AS NR_ATENDIMENTO
    , emp_cgc AS CNPJ
    , emp_nome_fantasia AS DS_UNIDADE
    , emp_nome_fantasia AS MARCA
    , 0 AS CD_PROCEDENCIA
    , 'NAO ENCONTRADO' AS DS_PROCEDENCIA
    , 'NAO ENCONTRADO' AS ID
    , CONVERT(INT, DAY(osm_dthr)) AS DIA
    , CONVERT(INT, MONTH(osm_dthr)) AS MES
    , CONVERT(INT, YEAR(osm_dthr)) AS ANO
FROM osm
INNER JOIN smm
    ON smm_osm_serie = osm_serie
        AND smm_osm = osm_num
INNER JOIN pac
    ON pac_reg = osm_pac
INNER JOIN cnv
    ON osm_cnv = cnv_cod
INNER JOIN str
    ON str_cod = osm_str
INNER JOIN psv
    ON psv_cod = osm_mreq
LEFT OUTER JOIN str str_e
    ON str.str_str_cod = str_e.str_cod
LEFT OUTER JOIN emp
    ON str_e.str_emp_cod = emp_cod
WHERE 1 = 1
    AND (
        smm_pacote IS NULL
        OR (smm_pacote = 'C')
        )
    AND smm_sfat NOT IN ('C')

AND osm_dthr BETWEEN GETDATE() - 730 AND GETDATE()

SELECT DISTINCT AGM_PAC AS CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    , agm.agm_cnv_cod AS CD_CONVENIO
    , emp_cgc AS CNPJ
    , CONVERT(DATE, AGM_HINI) AS DATA_AGENDA
    , LEFT(CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), agm_hini, 114), 8) AS HORA_AGENDA
    , CASE AGM_ATEND
        WHEN 'CRG'
            THEN 'Cirurgia'
        WHEN 'ASS'
            THEN 'Consulta'
        when '' then 'Consulta'
        ELSE 'Outros'
        END AS TIPO_AGENDA
    , pac.PAC_NOME AS NM_PACIENTE
    , smk.smk_nome AS DS_PROCEDIMENTO_PRINC
    , ' ' DS_PROCEDIMENTO_ADIC
    , 1 AS IE_QUANTIDADE
    , USR_NOME AS NM_USUARIO
    , psv_nome AS NM_MEDICO
    , EMP_NOME_FANTASIA AS DS_UNIDADE
    , EMP_NOME_FANTASIA AS MARCA
    , CASE 
        WHEN AGM_STAT = 'A'
            THEN 'Aberta'
        WHEN AGM_STAT = 'E'
            THEN 'Executada'
        WHEN AGM_STAT = 'C'
            THEN 'Cancelada'
        WHEN AGM_STAT = 'B'
            THEN 'Bloqueada'
        END STATUS_AGENDA
    , CONVERT(VARCHAR, convert(VARCHAR, AGM_OSM_SERIE) + convert(VARCHAR, AGM_OSM_NUM)) AS NR_ATENDIMENTO
    , AGM_num AS NR_SEQUENCIA
    , '' ID
    , '' AS CD_PROCEDENCIA
    , agm_proc AS DS_PROCEDENCIA
    , agm.AGM_DTMRC AS DT_AGENDAMENTO
    , CONVERT(INT, DAY(AGM_HINI)) AS DIA
    , CONVERT(INT, MONTH(AGM_HINI)) AS MES
    , CONVERT(INT, YEAR(AGM_HINI)) AS ANO
    , ' ' DS_CLASSIFICACAO
    , ' ' DS_AGRUPAMENTO
    , agm.AGM_CANC_MOT_COD AS CD_MOTIVO_CANCELAMENTO
    , agm.AGM_CANC_MOT_TIPO AS DS_MOTIVO_CANCELAMENTO
    , agm_med AS CD_AGENDA
FROM agm
INNER JOIN usr
    ON (agm.agm_usr_login = usr.usr_login)
INNER JOIN psv
    ON (psv.psv_cod = agm.agm_med)
INNER JOIN smk
    ON (
            agm_smk = smk_cod
            AND agm_tpsmk = smk_tipo
            )
INNER JOIN pac
    ON (pac_reg = agm_pac)
INNER JOIN loc
    ON (AGM_LOC = LOC_COD)
INNER JOIN str
    ON (LOC_STR = STR.STR_COD)
INNER JOIN str str_e
    ON (STR.STR_STR_COD = STR_E.STR_COD)
INNER JOIN cnv
    ON (CNV_COD = AGM_CNV_COD)
LEFT OUTER JOIN ctf ct1
    ON (
            ct1.ctf_cod = smk_ctf
            AND ct1.ctf_tipo = smk_tipo
            )
LEFT OUTER JOIN emp
    ON emp_cod = str_e.str_emp_cod
WHERE 1 = 1

AND AGM_DTMRC BETWEEN GETDATE() - 730 AND GETDATE()

'IOF' AS MARCA
FROM RCL
INNER JOIN PSV ON PSV_COD = RCL_MED

WHERE RCL_DTHR_ATUAL BETWEEN GETDATE() - 730 AND GETDATE()

SELECT distinct agd_med AS CD_AGENDA 
    , 0 AS DS_AGENDA
    , 0 CD_TIPO_AGENDA
    , psv_cod AS CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    , emp_cgc AS CNPJ
    , '' AS DS_AREA_ATUACAO
    , 'A' AS IE_SITUACAO
    -- , CASE 
    --     WHEN (agd_dt_reconstr IS not NULL and AGD_DT_GERA is not null)
    --         THEN agd_dt_reconstr
    --     WHEN (agd_dt_reconstr IS NULL and AGD_DT_GERA is not null)
    --         THEN agd_dt_gera
    --     ELSE AGD_DT_GERA
    --     END AS DT_ATUALIZACAO
FROM agd
INNER JOIN PSV
    ON agd_med = psv_cod
INNER JOIN loc
    ON loc_cod = agd_loc
INNER JOIN str
    ON str_cod = loc_str
LEFT OUTER JOIN str str_e
    ON str_e.str_cod = str.str_str_cod
LEFT OUTER JOIN emp
    ON emp_cod = str_e.str_emp_cod

source.oracleReaderQuery:
select pf.cd_pessoa_fisica, pf.nm_pessoa_fisica, 

to_char(at.dt_entrada,'dd/mm/yyyy') as dt_entrada,
to_char(at.dt_entrada,'hh24:mi:ss') as hr_entrada, 

obter_nome_pf(at.cd_medico_resp) as nm_medico, c.cd_convenio, obter_nome_convenio(c.cd_convenio) AS ds_convenio, 
at.nr_atendimento,
e.cd_cgc as CNPJ,
nm_fantasia_estab DS_UNIDADE,
em.nm_razao_social MARCA,

at.cd_procedencia,
p.ds_procedencia,
'NAO ENCONTRADO' as ID,

to_char(at.dt_entrada,'dd') dia,
to_char(at.dt_entrada,'mm') mes,
to_char(at.dt_entrada,'yyyy') ano,
at.dt_cancelamento,
at.dt_atualizacao

from 
atendimento_paciente at, 
pessoa_fisica pf,
atend_categoria_convenio c,
procedencia p,
estabelecimento e,
empresa em
where at.cd_pessoa_fisica = pf.cd_pessoa_fisica
and at.cd_procedencia = p.cd_procedencia (+)
and at.nr_atendimento = c.nr_atendimento
and at.cd_estabelecimento = e.cd_estabelecimento
and e.cd_empresa = em.cd_empresa

AND at.dt_entrada between SYSDATE - 730 AND SYSDATE

-- Consulta Sadalla - Azure

select o.nr_sequencia as nr_sequencia, to_char(o.dt_atualizacao,'dd/mm/yyyy') as dt_atualizacao,
to_char(o.dt_atualizacao,'hh24:mi:ss') as hr_atualizacao, 
o.nr_atendimento, o.cd_profissional as cd_medico ,obter_nome_pf(o.cd_profissional) as nm_medico, r.ds_retorno, substr(o.ds_conduta,1,1000) as ds_conduta,
obter_pessoa_atendimento(o.nr_atendimento, 'C') as cd_pessoa_fisica,

(select unique d.cd_doenca ||' - '|| a.ds_doenca_cid
from diagnostico_doenca d, 
     cid_doenca a
where a.cd_doenca_cid = d.cd_doenca
and d.nr_atendimento = o.nr_atendimento
and d.nr_seq_interno = (select max(x.nr_seq_interno) from diagnostico_doenca x where x.nr_atendimento = d.nr_atendimento)) as ds_diagnostico,

obter_nome_estab(obter_estab_atendimento(o.nr_atendimento)) as DS_UNIDADE,

e.cd_cgc as cnpj,

'SADALLA' as marca 

from oft_consulta_medica o,
     oft_retorno r,
     estabelecimento e
where o.nr_seq_retorno = r.nr_sequencia
and o.nr_atendimento is not null
and obter_estab_atendimento(o.nr_atendimento) = e.cd_estabelecimento

and o.dt_atualizacao between SYSDATE - 730 AND SYSDATE

-- Agendamento Sadalla - Azure

select a.cd_pessoa_fisica, 
a.cd_convenio, 
obter_cnpj_estabelecimento(ag.cd_estabelecimento) as cnpj,
to_char(a.dt_agenda, 'dd/mm/yyyy') as data_agenda,
to_char(a.dt_agenda, 'hh24:mi:ss') as hora_agenda,
'Consulta' as tipo_agenda,
pf.nm_pessoa_fisica as nm_paciente,
obter_desc_procedimento(10502, 1) as ds_procedimento_princ,
'' ds_procedimento_adic,
1 as ie_quantidade,
obter_nome_usuario(a.nm_usuario_origem) as nm_usuario,
obter_nome_pf(ag.cd_pessoa_fisica) as nm_medico,
nm_fantasia_estab DS_UNIDADE,
em.nm_razao_social MARCA,
obter_valor_dominio(83,a.ie_status_agenda) as status_agenda,
a.nr_atendimento,
a.nr_sequencia,
'NAO ENCONTRADO' as ID,
a.cd_procedencia,
p.ds_procedencia,
a.dt_agendamento,

to_char(a.dt_agenda,'dd') dia,
to_char(a.dt_agenda,'mm') mes,
to_char(a.dt_agenda,'yyyy') ano,
ac.ds_classificacao ,
aa.ds_agrupamento ds_agrupamento,
a.cd_motivo_cancelamento,
substr(obter_ds_motivo_status(a.nr_sequencia, a.cd_agenda),1,200) as ds_motivo_cancelamento,
a.cd_agenda,

a.dt_atualizacao

from agenda_consulta a,
     agenda ag,
     pessoa_fisica pf,
     procedencia p,
     agenda_classif ac,
     agrupamento_agenda aa,
     estabelecimento e,
     empresa em
where a.cd_agenda = ag.cd_agenda
and a.cd_pessoa_fisica = pf.cd_pessoa_fisica (+)
and a.cd_procedencia = p.cd_procedencia(+)
and a.ie_classif_agenda  = ac.cd_classificacao(+)
and ag.nr_seq_agrupamento = aa.nr_sequencia (+)
and ag.cd_estabelecimento = e.cd_estabelecimento
and e.cd_empresa = em.cd_empresa
and a.cd_pessoa_fisica is not null

and a.dt_agendamento between SYSDATE - 730 AND SYSDATE

select u.nm_usuario, 
u.ds_usuario, 
u.ie_situacao, 
u.dt_atualizacao,
obter_nome_estabelecimento(u.cd_estabelecimento) as DS_UNIDADE,
e.cd_cgc as CNPJ,
obter_nome_empresa(obter_empresa_estab(u.cd_estabelecimento)) as Marca
from usuario u,
     empresa em,
     estabelecimento e
where u.cd_estabelecimento = e.cd_estabelecimento
and e.cd_empresa = em.cd_empresa

SELECT A.CD_AGENDA, A.DS_AGENDA, A.CD_TIPO_AGENDA, A.CD_PESSOA_FISICA, E.CD_CGC as CNPJ, (SELECT X.DS_AREA_ATUACAO FROM AREA_ATUACAO_MEDICA X
WHERE X.NR_SEQUENCIA = A.NR_SEQ_AREA_ATUACAO) AS DS_AREA_ATUACAO, A.IE_SITUACAO,
A.DT_ATUALIZACAO
FROM AGENDA A,
     ESTABELECIMENTO E
WHERE A.CD_ESTABELECIMENTO = E.CD_ESTABELECIMENTO

properties.description: ATENO: ao atender solicitao do clculo de SLA, a Requestia passou a exportar um novo arquivo com novos campos. Para simplificar a alterao, alteraremos apenas a conexo.
